categories: Thermo Rhea Mid Arctic Grip Waterproof Winter
description: Designed to add warmth where you need it, these boots keep your toes toasty. Layers of insulation and 2 different types of waterproofing make the Thermo Rhea Mid Boots ready to face winter’s worst. They're anchored by a grippy rubber sole designed to keep you secure when encountering slick or iced-over surfaces.Full-grain leather and M Select™ DRY membrane keep water out and let your feet breath.200g Primaloft® Gold series insulation offers an incredible warmth to weight ratio.Fleece collar helps hold in the warmth.Conductor™ fleece lining wicks away moisture.2mm of Primaloft Aerogel over the toes seals in warmth where it's needed.Water-resistant zipper on the inner ankle makes getting in and out easy.Kinetic Fit™ contoured insole and nylon shank provide flexible support.Moulded EVA midsole with a stacked leather heel.Vibram® Arctic Grip outsole provides incredible traction on wet ice. Aggressive tread pattern and deep lugs provide traction everywhere else.
name: Merrell Thermo Rhea Mid Arctic Grip Waterproof Winter Boots - Women's
